entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Custom font does not apply to RemoteViews in ongoing notification #28946
  • Add Focus propagation to MauiView #28945
    .NET 9 SR7
  • [Android, 9.0.60] Enabling LLVM on Android crashes the app at start #28939
    .NET 9 SR7
  • [TabbedPage] PopToRootAsync displaying wrong page #28933
    Backlog
  • Incorrect label LineBreakMode in IOS inside CarouselView #28930
    .NET 9 SR6
  • Windows Foreground threads not working as expected #28929
    Backlog
  • [REGRESSION, 9.0.60 Android] Many labels are of wrong size #28928
    .NET 9 SR6

Closed

  • Adding GestureRecognizer To Editor prevents focus on Android & iOS #27831
    Backlog
  • AccessViolationException in CarouselView on dynamic Shell navigation on Windows #27925
  • GetManifestResourceStream doesn't work when project name is different than RootNamespace #28569
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `maui/main` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #28112
  • SearchBar.Focused / Unfocused Events Not Triggered on Windows (MAUI 9) #28927
  • Font size changes after focus when using contenteditable body in MAUI WebView on iOS #28848
    Backlog
  • Your app used deprecated APIs or parameters for edge to edge. #28926

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android]Fix: Swapping out the content of a RefreshView breaks on Android #28944
    community ✨
  • Add a prompt for triage #28943
  • [ci] Produce nightly for inflight/current #28940
  • [Testing] Feature Matrix UITest Cases for CollectionView Header/Footer Feature #28938
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [net10.0] Merge main to net10 #28937
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #28936
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fixed the OnPlatform does not work for header property in Collection view #28935
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Controls Disappear When WebView is Used with Hardware Acceleration Disabled #28934
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed BarTextColor applied to secondary toolbar items #28932
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Compute LayoutConstraints on new *StackLayout and Grid #28931
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR7

Merged

  • [XC] add IRootObjectProvider #28310
    area-xaml, .NET 9 SR7
  • [iOS] Fix for the File.ContentType from MediaPicker not being in valid MIME format #28842
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-essentials, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, essentials-file-picker, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Android] Fixed the Incorrect Text Color Applied to Selected Tab in TabbedPage #28844
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fix FlyoutPage does not respond to changes in the FlyoutLayoutBehavior property #28884
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Upgrade to Windows App SDK 1.7 #28499
    platform/windows 🪟, area-infrastructure, community ✨, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Android] Fixed ScalingCanvas.SetBlur not working #28911
    area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Fix PaddingWithoutSafeArea #28919
    community ✨, testing-flakiness
  • [ai] Add release notes prompt #28896
  • [iOS] - Resolved Proper Rendering of Dynamic Header/Footer Updates in CV2 #28641
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fixed the TargetInvocationException Occurs When Selecting Header/Footer After Changing ItemsLayout in CV2 #28890
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7

Updated

  • [2025/04/11] Candidate - In Flight Branch #28867
    p/0, area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR7
  • [iOS] Fixing #28912 by only hiding context buttons when user already stopped dragging the cell #28914
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR7
  • [2025/04/07] Staging - In Flight Branch #28486
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fixed Label text cropping when a width request is specified on the label inside a VerticalStackLayout with specified with request #28661
    area-layout, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Picker - focus/unfocus events #28122
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-picker, .NET 9 SR7
  • [iOS] - Fix Custom FlyoutIcon from Being Overridden to Default Color in Shell #27580
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • Support XmlnsDefinitionAttribute in "this" assembly #28090
    area-xaml, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Windows] Fix for IndicatorView using templated icons not working #28905
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Footer not displayed at the Bottom When EmptyView in CV2 #28681
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • [iOS] Fixed NavigationStack not updating when OnAppearing is invoked #28666
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • Stop iOS SetNeedsLayout propagation by looking at VisualElement computed Constraint #28479
    area-layout, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR7
  • [iOS] DatePicker | Remove unnecessary UpdateDate() call in UpdateTextColor() #27811
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR7
  • [X] Protect some xmlns #28909
    area-xaml
  • [Android] Added Platform specific ripple color #23599
    proposal/open, community ✨, area-controls-button, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [iOS] CollectionView2 - empty view - improvements #28119
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR7
  • Shell - Propagate BackButtonBehaviorProperty #28615
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Android] MediaPicker: Use New Photo Picker #24027
    area-essentials, community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Nullable TimePicker (make Time nullable) #27930
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-datetimepicker, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [Android] Fixed issue where group Header/Footer template was applied to all items when IsGrouped was true for an ObservableCollection #28886
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fixed KeepLastItemInView for CV1 and added support for KeepLastItemInView for CV2 #28720
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Windows] Upgrade `Microsoft.Graphics.Win2D` from `1.2.0` to `1.3.2` to fix a build warning #28885
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨
  • [net10.0, Testing] Enabled failed UITests for Switch control due to new OffColor API. #28495
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
